text: Airtable is a no-code platform
that gives non-programmers the ability
to build business applications.

and now we're really excited

to be working on an AI
layer to our platform,
powered by Amazon Bedrock.

We found the developer
experience to be really good.

really easy to get integrated.

one developer and our team

There are a few things that are
unique about Amazon Bedrock.
One is just the model selection.

So we like to give our
customers a lot of choice

The second piece is that it's secure,
